Detailed Description

Defines a C++ wrapper facade for the shared memory transport address family format.

ACE_INLINE int ACE_MEM_Addr::operator== (  const ACE_MEM_Addr &    sap )  const

ACE_INLINE int ACE_MEM_Addr::set (  const ACE_TCHAR    port_number[] ) 
 

Uses <getservbyname> to initialize an <ACE_INET_Addr> from a <port_name>, the remote <host_name>, and the <protocol>.

ACE_INLINE int ACE_MEM_Addr::set (  u_short    port_number,
int    encode = 1
) 
 

Initializes an <ACE_INET_Addr> from a <port_number> and the remote <host_name>. If <encode> is enabled then <port_number> is converted into network byte order, otherwise it is assumed to be in network byte order already and are passed straight through.
